code: import Slider from"react-slick";import"slick-carousel/slick/slick-theme.css";import"slick-carousel/slick/slick.css";import Project from'../assets/login.png';import data from'../data/projects.json';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Projects=()=>{const settings={dots:true,infinite:false,initialSlide:0,slidesToShow:3,slidesToScroll:3,responsive:[{breakpoint:600,settings:{infinite:false,initialSlide:0,slidesToShow:1,slidesToScroll:1}}]};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{id:"projects",className:"projects",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"heading",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"PROJECTS"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"projects-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Slider,{...settings,children:data.map((project,key)=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"project",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:Project,alt:"Project"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"name",children:project.name}),project.description.length>130?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"description-min",children:project.description}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"description",children:project.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{className:"project-button",target:"_blank",href:project.link,rel:"noreferrer",children:"GitHub"})})]})},key);})})})]});};export default Projects;
